We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private DeMarkerIndicator _dem;
// In Initialize()
_dem = DEM(symbol, period, type);

// In OnData()
if (_dem.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "DEM Current", _dem.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.dem = self.DEM(symbol, period, type)

# In OnData()
if self.dem.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "DEM Current", self.dem.Current);
